author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> for tx replacement dos protection, are we mostly worried about bandwidth or compute? because for compute the “only allow replacement txs with identical blobs” solution would be a simple fix, but for that to help with bandwidth we would need to change how we announce / request blob txs

author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> how easy would it be to throttle either the rate at which clients request blob txs from peers or the rate at which they announce new ones? if we could introduce an upper bound there on either side, that would be another robust solution
